basic_info.description: ​I'm Anna, a Game Designer/Project Manager with an expected mathematical degree. I gained the most of my experience in game development by working in indie teams, where I create concepts, write design documents, and organize the work of other talented specialists. I've started to actively develop in game design about two years ago and the following is a selection of what I've done so far.

projects.title: Mind&Machine
projects.description1: Mind&Machine - 3D sci-fi adventure where you can obey devices on a spaceship and explore the mysterious spaceship with them.
projects.description2: The most expanded project I had an opportunity to work with. I'm making this game in a team of 9 people as a final submission for game development courses I'm currently participating in. my tasks include all the work of a game designer, from creating and writing documentation for features to integrating and configuring them in Unity.

projects.title: HYPERCASUAL MOBILE
projects.description1: Making Doodle Jump even easier to play and with gacha mechanic.
projects.description2: This is a small android game, that I'm writing game design documentation for. During the development process in team of 6 people, I've gained experience of creating simple metagame and monetization mechanics, as well as trained some more for general systemic design.

projects.title: Jam Project
projects.description1: A 3d runner where size of player is not a constant. I designed and imlemented this game in team of 9 in 48 hours.
projects.description2: This is my first experience doing design for 3d graphic and realistic physics project.

projects.title: Jam Project
projects.description1: A puzzle game with focus on timings which I designed and imlemented in team of 6 in 72 hours.
projects.description2: In this project I had a first exipirience managing large team and working with another game designer at my help.

projects.title: Jam Project
projects.description1: A small quest game which I did on my own during LudumDare Jam .

projects.title: Application task for Game Design courses
projects.description1: The test task I made to enroll in Wargaming Academy, game development courses produced by one of the largest game dev company of Post-Soviet states. I've proven my qualification and been selected among others.

experience.title: Completing my first bachelor degree at Applied Mathematics
